name: Creative Image
description: Experimented with lighting, scene, image reflection, image rotation and different image mapping.
responsibilities: Loaded different objects into the scene; implemented texture mapping to the scene and each object.
Implemented object movement and rotation by using matrix addition and multiplication respectively.
Experimented with Phong shading, and Gouraud shading; experimented with spotlight
Implemented keyboard interaction to control an object.

name: Restaurant Management
description: This system helps a restaurant organize easily. Each position can access/modify database differently.
responsibilities: Designed a page for staff and foodItem using HTML and CSS; co-wrote an E/R diagram; normalized each table to be in 3NF or BCNF; co-wrote SQL DDL to create all the tables in SQL.
Implemented the Staff page using MySQL and PHP.
